title: Distribution Transformer Modeling for Application in Three-Phase Power Flow Algorithm

authors.name: Jose Luis Choque
affiliations: Universidad Nacional de San Agustin de Arequipa

abstract: In this paper, it is presented a methodology for three-phase distribution transformer modeling, considering several types of transformer configuration, to be used in algorithms of power flow in three-phase radial distribution networks. The paper provides a detailed discussion about the models and the results from an implementation of the power flow algorithm. The results, taken from three different networks, are presented for several transformer configurations and for voltage regulators as well.
